channel.title: PI how do i make barrows items (Wont be broken)
channel.description: How do i make those barrows items dont broke . Example: When i drop my barrows item , it turn to ahrims staff 0 . Got to go to fix it , how do i change it when it drops on the ground it doesnt broken or turn to ahrims staff 0 . I kinda forgot how to change it :x please help thanks !

item.title: PI how do i make barrows items (Wont be broken)
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

if you’re PI, go to combat assistant and look for something like this [code] /* DEGRADING
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] >= 13899) {
c.degradeTime++;
}
if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13899 && c.degradeTime == 450) {// VLS Degrade.
c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item
c.sendMessage(“Your vesta’s longsword has degraded into nothing.”); // send a message
c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500
}
if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13902 && c.degradeTime == 500) {// STAT Degrade.
c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item
c.sendMessage(“Your Statius warhammer has degraded into nothing.”); // send a message
c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500
}
if(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 13905 && c.degradeTime == 450) {// Spear Degrade.
c.getItems().wearItem(-1, 1, 3); // remove the equiped item
c.sendMessage(“Your vesta’s spear has degraded into nothing.”); // send a message
c.degradeTime = 0; // put the degrade number back to 0 so it can degrade again @ 500
}
if(c.specEffect == 4) {
c.specEffect = 0;

	}
                /* DEGRADING */[/code]

all degrading is in combat assistant, i know this is just pk armor and weps but its in there and too lazy to look for it

Read full topic

item.title: PI how do i make barrows items (Wont be broken)
item.dc:creator: @Badmanjelly34 Badmanjelly34
item.description:
@Badmanjelly34 wrote:

in class 8 in client files look at the id for ahrims staff 0 it should be their as this is a custom item in a fashion delete it and delete the files for it. i think you would have to make a whole drop process on metasequoia of the item on the floor i am not sure. if you did that would take some time. but then again it is fairly simple for a moderate coder. you could post your files on moparscape asking someone to do it for you
